title: Energy grid £28bn upgrade to add £108 to household bills
description: Ofgem says the investment cash being demanded of energy customers will be mostly offset by efficiencies delivered by the projects.
content:
The energy regulator has confirmed plans for a massive upgrade to the UK's energy grids, adding £108 to customer bills by 2031.
